category.title: Welcome to Access My Info
category.callout: Want to know what your mobile operator or internet provider knows about you? What do they keep on file? Who do they share it with? According to the HK government's Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance, companies are required to disclose this information to their customers upon request. We can help with that request.
category.label: Category
category.requestsProcessed: Join the 231 other people who have created a request on this system.
category.instruction1: What does your mobile phone or internet provider know about you?
category.instruction2: Find out by requesting access to your personal data. This website will help you write a letter that your telco must respond to, by law.
category.instruction3: It only takes 5 easy steps. Let’s get started!
category.info-1: Access My Info (AMI) is a web application that enables you to find out what your telecommunication or internet service providers (ISP) know about you. It guides you via a step-by-step wizard to generate a formal letter that requests access to your personal information. This letter can then be sent via postal mail or email to the respective company’s privacy officer.
category.sponsorStatement: Access My Info is a joint initiative created by members of
category.socialMediaMessage: Spread the word about our project:

operator.title: Select your service provider
operator.callout: Begin your request by selecting a company that provides your mobile phone and/or internet service.
operator.label: Companies

questions.title: What data do you want to access?
questions.callout: Make enquiries about how your data is collected, used, shared and stored.
questions.bank-desc: Federal government departments store personal data in “data banks”. Specifying specific data banks for {{operator}} to look through to find your personal data will improve the chances of a successful request. We have identified some data banks of interest, but please check the full list here and add any you see fit.
questions.otherBank: To add another data bank to your request, please consult the full list of {{operator}} data banks here.
questions.desc-bank: Describe the data bank you want

subject.title: Identifying information
subject.callout: Enter your information so {{company}} can identify you in their records.
subject.callout-not-store: Access My Info will not collect or store any of the personal information below.
subject.label: Your Personal Information

request.title: Your request is ready
request.callout: Your letter to {{operator}} has been successfully generated by our system.
request.callout-hkid-email: Important: Attach a scan or digital photo of your HKID or passport to the email. Your request may not be accepted without proof of identity.
request.callout-hkid-postal: Important: Attach a photocopy or printout of your HKID or passport to your letter. Your request may not be accepted without proof of identity.

instructions.choice-intro: How would you like to send your letter?
instructions.read-careful: Read over the letter carefully, then follow the instructions below.
instructions.post-instructions: Use the button below to create a PDF of your letter. Then print it and mail it to:
instructions.email-instructions: Use the button below to email your letter to:
instructions.email-unavailable: Option 1 Unavailable: No email listed for company privacy officer.
instructions.email-empty-prompt: If the email is empty or the button didn't work...
instructions.email-empty-instructions: Click here to copy the text of the email to your clipboard

request.emailProblem: Problem? Simply copy & paste the below text into your email client and send to {{email}}
request.thanks: That's it! Thank you for participating in the Access My Info Hong Kong project.
request.continue: Continue on to maximize your impact

finish.title: Thank you for submitting your request!
finish.share-prompt: Share this campaign with your friends:
finish.label-data: Access My Info Hong Kong may collect the number of my data access request made via this programme for the statistics and research purposes.
finish.label-subscribe: Access My Info Hong Kong may use my email address regularly for the purposes of reminding me the progress of my request and inviting me to complete a survey and store my email address in a server located in Canada.
finish.text-data: Share the following data with Access My Info Hong Kong: Request made to {{operator}} for the {{servicelist}} in {{jurisdiction}} on {{date}}.
finish.text-subscribe: I agree that Access My Info Hong Kong may send me emails regularly to remind me of the progress of my data access request. I, therefore, authorise Access My Info Hong Kong to store my email address in a server located in Canada.  Access My Info Hong Kong may send me an email alert or instructions to deal with situations where {{operator}} fails to give a reply after a specified period of time. Should I receive a reply, I agree that Access My Info Hong Kong may send me an email invitation to complete a short survey. I understand that Access My Info Hong Kong will not disclose my email address to any third parties, other than the email service which sends the emails to me.

wrapper.privacy:
This service does not collect any of the personal information you provide. This information is used only to generate a letter, which is done entirely in your web browser. Other web pages linked to from this service will be goverened by different policies. When you load the service, the web server that hosts the service logs a record of that event. These logs include the IP address used to access each resource required for the service, the date & time of access, and several other non-identifying metadata fields.

In the event you provides us your email address to contact you, we will only use it for the specific purposes agreed by you. We will not use, disclose, transfer your email address to any third parties beyond the purposes of administering the Access My Info service.
wrapper.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This is a research and educational tool and is meant for informational purposes only. This service does not provide legal advice. You are solely responsible for your use of this service and any resulting consequences. Open Effect and partners make no claims, promises, or guarantees about the accuracy, completeness, or adequacy of the information contained in this document. This software is offered as-is, with no warranty. Nothing herein should be used as a substitute for the legal advice of competent counsel.
wrapper.license: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
